Package com.toldcalculator.android.tc.controller

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    NewFlightFragment
    This Fragment subclass is the landing page for Told Calculator.
    PerformanceFragment
    This Fragment subclass is where the user is presented with all relevant information.
    SavedDataFragment
    This Fragment subclass displays all the saved takeoff data and allows the user to select from the list and display the takeoff data on the PerformanceFragment page.
    SettingsFragment
    This Fragment subclass is used to allow the user to set some settings using shared preferences.
    WeatherFragment
    A simple Fragment subclass that displays weather.
    WeightFragment
    This Fragment subclass allows the user to input weight information for the flight.
